# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the port.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property can’t change while the VM is running. A null value indicates a name isn’t set.

## Configuring the port

- **attachment**: An array of serial port attachments.

items.description: An array of serial port attachments.
items.name: attachment
